dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.
dependencies.name: ninja

dependent_to.description: C++ runtime system for parallellism and concurrency.
dependent_to.name: pika

description:
A real time, nanosecond resolution, remote telemetry, hybrid frame and
sampling profiler for games and other applications. Client library.
name: tracy-client

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: CMake build type
variants.name: build_type

variants.description: Enfore callstack collection for tracy regions
variants.name: callstack

variants.description: Enable delayed initialization of the library (init on first call)
variants.name: delayed_init

variants.description: Enable profiling
variants.name: enable

variants.description: Enable fibers support
variants.name: fibers

variants.description: the build system generator to use
variants.name: generator

variants.description: CMake interprocedural optimization
variants.name: ipo

variants.description: Enable the manual lifetime management of the profile
variants.name: manual_lifetime

variants.description: Disable client discovery by broadcast to local network
variants.name: no_broadcast

variants.description: Disable all callstack related functionality
variants.name: no_callstack

variants.description: Disables the inline functions in callstacks
variants.name: no_callstack_inlines

variants.description: Disable collection of source code
variants.name: no_code_transfer

variants.description: Disable capture of context switches
variants.name: no_context_switch

variants.description: Disable crash handling
variants.name: no_crash_handler

variants.description: Client executable does not exit until all profile data is sent to server
variants.name: no_exit

variants.description: Disable the frame image support and its thread
variants.name: no_frame_image

variants.description: Disable call stack sampling
variants.name: no_sampling

variants.description: Disable systrace sampling
variants.name: no_system_tracing

variants.description: Disable zone validation for C API
variants.name: no_verify

variants.description: Disable capture of hardware Vsync events
variants.name: no_vsync_capture

variants.description: On-demand profiling
variants.name: on_demand

variants.description: Tracy will only accept connections on IPv4 addresses (disable IPv6)
variants.name: only_ipv4

variants.description: Only listen on the localhost interface
variants.name: only_localhost

variants.description: Build the client library as a shared library
variants.name: shared

variants.description: Use lower resolution timers
variants.name: timer_fallback
